/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars, trucks, and buses, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Buildings of different sizes and designs flank the street, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. In the distance, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the cityscape. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
